entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 27 April 2023
